name: Phoebe Bridgers Song Crafter
description:
Want to talk about this game and others? Join our Discord.

Phoebe Bridgers Song Crafter is a band-in-a-box app with a very specific purpose - to help you craft complete songs in the style of indie folksters such as Phoebe Bridgers, Bright Eyes, Wilco and more.

It is a multi-featured, yet accessible approach to music making for those with or without experience. All music produced is 

If you enjoy, please rate, review and share using @TimSheinman.
